updateComment(int, String) - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.services.CommentServices
Sets the property 'comment' of the specified instance of the Comment class and stores this instance into the database.

Triggers the method updateComment.
updateImage(User, byte[]) - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.services.UserServices
Sets the property 'profileImage' of specified instance of User class.
updateTask(int, String, String) - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.services.TaskServices
Sets the properties 'taskName' and 'task' of the specified instance of the Task class and stores this instance into the database.
updateTaskInDB(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.servlet.ForumServlet
Triggers the method updateTask of TaskServices class for updating specified task.
updateTopic(String, String, String) - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.services.TopicServices
Sets the properties 'topic' and 'visibility' of the specified instance of the Topic class and stores this instance into the database.
updateTopicSubscriptions(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.servlet.ForumServlet
Clears the list of instances of User class for specified instance of Topic class, if the visibility of the topic changes from 'private' to 'public'.
updateUserSubscriptions() - Method in class sk.tsystems.forum.servlet.ForumServlet
Triggers method removeSubscriber of the TopicServices class for each instance of the Topic class that are stored in the database
